channel.title: WOTC Matthew Mercer homebrew Lingering Soul
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "WOTC Matthew Mercer homebrew Lingering Soul" - Wondering if the class should be added?

item.title: WOTC Matthew Mercer homebrew Lingering Soul
item.content:encoded:
Hi I'm new, so you probably shouldn't take this seriously, but the frontpage says that everything there is published stuff, yada yada, or WOTC affiliated homebrew content such as that created by Matt Mercer. I have provided a link to the class down below and I get that it isn'r copy and pasteable and nobody would want to type it out word for word, but I'm using a image to text software to get it and it works, somewhat. I just want the community to be able to use this without pain and yeah… Doing my one good deed for the year. If anyone replies to this or likes it or whatever I'll just take it as I should finish the class as I'm putting it all into a google docs so it's backed up.

This should work? Otherwise just search up Lingering Soul Matthew Mercer 1.1

file:///home/chronos/u-d90858ea59d06c93f6d40f7ee4fe94f64cbc3461/MyFiles/Downloads/563826-The_Lingering_Soul_v1.1.pdf

yay?
